data.title: Gunning Bedford Middle School
data.text:
Back to School Frequently Asked Questions

Back to School 2021/2022 We strive to keep you informed on the upcoming school year. Take a look at our frequently asked questions which will assist in the return to school! Website FAQ’s (2021_2022) (1) Website FAQ’s (2021_2022) (2) Website FAQ’s...

School Supplies List

The 2021-2022 school year is upon us! To prepare, please see the supply lists below. Find your child’s grade to view the supply items. Sixth Grade Supply List Click Here! Seventh Grade Supply List Click Here! Eighth Grade Supply List Click...

Welcome Back!

Walkthrough night on 8/26 4:30-6:30 Due to overwhelming popularity, we are offering another school walkthrough night this week. Please feel free to come visit GB and get to know our school. WE ask that everyone follow all mandated mask and social distance...

Sixth Grade Orientation

Welcome Incoming Sixth Graders! We can’t wait for you to show your panther pride. Please join us for a brief orientation and tour to welcome you to middle school. Masks and social distancing are required! Register for one of the two time slots by visiting this...

Summer Learning Opportunities

Attention Incoming Sixth, Seventh & Eighth Graders! Put down a device and pick up a good book this summer! We encourage all students to read this summer. Here are some book recommendations for students and families to select from, click here to view the entire...
